Package org.apache.cayenne.datasource

Class BadValidationQueryException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.sql.SQLException
          • org.apache.cayenne.datasource.BadValidationQueryException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Iterable<Throwable>

    public class BadValidationQueryException
extends SQLException
    Thrown when the pool fails to validate a fresh connection that is known to be in a good state.
    Since:
    4.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
